trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for data source controls that represent hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: 提供代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports a controls data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支援的控制項資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料，並加以呈現一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項的稱為資料繫結控制項，並協助繫結的類別稱為資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項可以表示任何資料來源︰ 檔案、 資料流、 關聯式資料庫、 商務物件等等。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式中的資料來源控制項呈現資料。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the HierarchicalDataSourceControl class, while data source controls that represent lists or tables of data derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項衍生自 HierarchicalDataSourceControl 類別，代表清單的資料來源控制項時，或資料表的資料衍生自該<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataSourceControl class is the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface, which defines a single method to retrieve hierarchical data source view objects associated with the data source control, <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: HierarchicalDataSourceControl 類別是基底實作的<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面，而後者可定義一個方法，以擷取階層式資料來源檢視物件相關聯資料來源控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can think of a data source control as the combination of the HierarchicalDataSourceControl object and its associated views on the underlying data, called data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以視為資料來源控制項之 HierarchicalDataSourceControl 物件和其相關聯的檢視，在基礎資料上，稱為資料來源檢視物件的組合。

trans-unit.source: While data source controls that represent tabular data are typically associated with only one named view, the HierarchicalDataSourceControl class supports a data source view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents.
trans-unit.target: 表示表格式資料的資料來源控制項通常只有一個具名的檢視與相關聯時，HierarchicalDataSourceControl 類別支援資料來源檢視的資料來源控制項所代表的階層式資料的每個層級。

trans-unit.source: The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method in the `viewPath` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 階層式資料的層級由唯一的階層式路徑，傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法中的`viewPath`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>物件定義的資料來源控制項表示，階層的層級的功能，並執行例如 insert、 update、 delete 和排序作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, use hierarchical data source controls to bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: Web 伺服器控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>，使用階層式資料來源控制項繫結至階層式資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Data source controls are implemented as controls to enable declarative persistence and to optionally permit participation in state management.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項會實作為控制項，讓宣告式的持續性，並選擇性地允許參與狀態管理。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls have no visual rendering, and therefore do not support themes.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項沒有視覺化呈現，並因此不支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Applies the style properties that are defined in the page style sheet to the control.
trans-unit.target: 套用至控制項的頁面樣式表中所定義的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> containing the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>包含控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the server control identifier generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 取得 ASP.NET 所產生的伺服器控制項識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The server control identifier generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 產生的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不使用資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> base class is not used for data source controls because data source controls do not render markup.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>基底類別不會用於資料來源控制項因為資料來源控制項不會呈現標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: This property is not used for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不使用資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref>表示 UI 階層架構中指定的伺服器控制項的子控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的伺服器控制項的子控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref>物件來保存伺服器控制項的子控制項 （常值和伺服器）。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class to prevent child controls from being added.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlCollection 方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別，以防止加入子控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> that prevents any child controls from being added.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref> ，防止加入任何子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this control supports themes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個控制項是否支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class has no visual rendering, it does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別沒有視覺化呈現，不支援佈景主題。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the EnableTheming property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定 EnableTheming 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified id parameter.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋具有指定的伺服器控制項目前命名容器 id 參數。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要找的控制項識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The specified control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的控制項，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果指定的控制項不存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定輸入焦點至控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class has no visual rendering, calling the Focus method on it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別具有沒有視覺化呈現，呼叫方法，它會擲回的焦點<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call the Focus method.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試呼叫焦點方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view helper object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref> interface for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 取得檢視協助程式物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref>介面指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This GetHierarchicalView method provides the default implementation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class, which simply returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個 GetHierarchicalView 方法提供的預設實作<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別，只會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class override this method and provide an implementation to return a strongly typed view that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別覆寫這個方法，並提供實作以傳回衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>強型別的檢視</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之檢視的階層式路徑。

trans-unit.source: A that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the viewPath parameter.
trans-unit.target: A ，代表所識別層級階層式資料的單一檢視 viewPath 參數。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control contains any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 判斷伺服器控制項是否包含任何子控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control contains other controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項包含其他控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, that the control should rebind, and that any necessary work should be performed.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 方法通知基礎資料來源或快取在記憶體中的資料已經變更，控制項應該重新繫結，以及任何所需的工作要執行的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 輸出至提供的伺服器控制項內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>物件並啟用追蹤時儲存控制項的追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收控制項內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至面板<xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> has no visual rendering, it does not support themes or skins.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>有任何視覺效果轉譯時，它不支援主題或面板。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the SkinID property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定 SkinID 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view helper object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref> interface for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 取得檢視協助程式物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref>介面指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called by clients when a <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> is manipulated as an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法由用戶端呼叫時<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>操作為<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: It delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method, which derived classes override to return strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> objects.
trans-unit.target: 它會委派至<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法，衍生類別覆寫以傳回強型別<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之檢視的階層式路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the viewPath parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 ，代表所識別層級階層式資料的單一檢視 viewPath 參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is visually displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否以視覺化方式顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class has no visual rendering, Visible always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別有沒有視覺化呈現，看得見一律會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the Visible property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定 Visible 屬性的值。
